'''Pumpkin''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Blocks ===
* {{BlockLink|Pumpkin}} – a block found naturally or farmed from pumpkin seeds.
* {{BlockLink|Carved Pumpkin}} – the carved variant of normal pumpkins.
* {{BlockLink|id=pumpkin-stem|Pumpkin Stem}} – the block that is placed and grown on farmland when pumpkin seeds are used on it.
** {{BlockLink|Attached Pumpkin Stem}}
* {{BlockLink|Jack o'Lantern}} – a luminous block which can be used to create golems.

=== Items ===
* {{ItemLink|Pumpkin Pie}} – a food item created using pumpkin.
* {{ItemLink|Pumpkin Seeds}} – an item used to farm pumpkin blocks.

=== Feature ===
* {{EnvLink|Pile|Pumpkin Pile}} – a feature that generates only in villages.

=== Tutorial ===
* [[Tutorial:Pumpkin and Melon farming|Pumpkin and Melon farming]]
